statements.nl_statement: Whenever the fault_manager reports cascading failures affecting multiple network elements, the network_controller must never allow total coverage gaps to exceed predefined geographical boundaries.

domain_info.description: Network management, 5G, and communication systems

statements.nl_statement: Whenever the interference_detector identifies a potential threat to communication quality, the spectrum_allocator must respond by reallocating frequencies within 2 seconds.

domain_info.description: Network management, 5G, and communication systems

statements.nl_statement: Whenever the interference_detector identifies a significant interference event, the spectrum_allocator must allocate alternative frequencies within a maximum of 5 seconds.

domain_info.description: Network management, 5G, and communication systems

statements.nl_statement: Whenever the interference_detector identifies malicious jamming attempts, the security_monitor must eventually isolate affected cells while the spectrum_allocator provides alternative frequency resources.

domain_info.description: Network management, 5G, and communication systems

statements.nl_statement: Whenever the load_balancer identifies an overloaded base_station, it must redistribute traffic to underutilized stations until load levels are balanced again.

domain_info.description: Network management, 5G, and communication systems

statements.nl_statement: Whenever the security_monitor identifies a potential intrusion attempt, the network_controller and base_station must coordinate to isolate the affected cell within three handover cycles.

domain_info.description: Network management, 5G, and communication systems
